verses.verse: (A <S%H8605>Prayer<s%> of the Afflicted, when he is faint, and pours out his complaint) (before the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>) <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my prayer, O Lord! And let my <S%H7775>cry<s%> for <S%H7775>help<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to Thee.

Do not <S%H5641>hide<s%> Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of my <S%H9496>distress;<s%> <S%H5186>Incline<s%> Thine <S%H241>ear<s%> to me; In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> me <S%H4118>quickly.<s%>
For my <S%H3117>days<s%> have <S%H3615>been<s%> <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> And my <S%H6106>bones<s%> have been <S%H2787>scorched<s%> like a <S%H4168>hearth.<s%>
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> has been <S%H5221>smitten<s%> like <S%H6212>grass<s%> and has <S%H3001>withered<s%> away, <S%H3588>Indeed,<s%> I <S%H7911>forget<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> my <S%H3899>bread.<s%>
<S%H4480>Because<s%> of the <S%H6963>loudness<s%> of my <S%H585>groaning<s%> My <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H1692>cling<s%> to my <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
I <S%H1819>resemble<s%> a <S%H6893>pelican<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness;<s%> I have <S%H1961>become<s%> like an <S%H9205>owl<s%> of the <S%H2723>waste<s%> <S%H2723>places.<s%>
I <S%H8245>lie<s%> <S%H8245>awake,<s%> I have <S%H1961>become<s%> like a <S%H909>lonely<s%> <S%H6833>bird<s%> on a <S%H1406>housetop.<s%>
My <S%H340>enemies<s%> have <S%H2778>reproached<s%> me <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> long; Those who <S%H1984>deride<s%> me have <S%H7650>used<s%> my [name] as a <S%H7650>curse.<s%>
For I have <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H665>ashes<s%> like <S%H3899>bread,<s%> And <S%H4537>mingled<s%> my <S%H8250>drink<s%> with <S%H1065>weeping,<s%>
<S%H4480>Because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of Thine <S%H2195>indignation<s%> and Thy <S%H7110>wrath;<s%> For Thou hast <S%H5375>lifted<s%> me up and <S%H7993>cast<s%> me <S%H7993>away.<s%>
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are like a <S%H5186>lengthened<s%> <S%H6738>shadow;<s%> And I <S%H3001>wither<s%> away like <S%H6212>grass.<s%>
But Thou, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> dost <S%H3427>abide<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> And Thy <S%H2143>name<s%> to <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

Thou wilt <S%H6965>arise<s%> [and] <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> For it is <S%H6256>time<s%> to be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to her, For the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>time<s%> has <S%H935>come.<s%>
<S%H3588>Surely<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7521>find<s%> <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in her <S%H68>stones,<s%> And <S%H2603>feel<s%> <S%H2603>pity<s%> for her <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
So the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H3372>fear<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> Thy <S%H9202>glory.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1129>built<s%> up <S%H6726>Zion;<s%> He has <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in His <S%H9202>glory.<s%>
He has <S%H6437>regarded<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of the <S%H6199>destitute,<s%> And has not <S%H959>despised<s%> their <S%H8605>prayer.<s%>

<S%H384>This<s%> will be <S%H3789>written<s%> for the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come;<s%> That a <S%H5971>people<s%> yet to be <S%H1254>created<s%> may <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3050>Lord.<s%>
For He <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H8259>down<s%> from His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4791>height;<s%> From <S%H8064>heaven<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5027>gazed<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth,<s%>
To <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H603>groaning<s%> of the <S%H615>prisoner;<s%> To <S%H6605>set<s%> <S%H6605>free<s%> <S%H1121>those<s%> <S%H1121>who<s%> were <S%H1121>doomed<s%> to <S%H8546>death;<s%>
That [men] may <S%H5608>tell<s%> of the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> And His <S%H8416>praise<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>
When the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> are <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H9191>together,<s%> And the <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
He has <S%H6031>weakened<s%> my <S%H3581>strength<s%> in the <S%H1870>way;<s%> He has <S%H9527>shortened<s%> my <S%H3117>days.<s%>

I <S%H559>say,<s%> "O my <S%H410>God,<s%> do not <S%H5927>take<s%> me <S%H5927>away<s%> in the <S%H2677>midst<s%> of my <S%H3117>days,<s%> Thy <S%H8141>years<s%> are throughout <S%H1755>all<s%> <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
"Of <S%H6440>old<s%> Thou didst <S%H3245>found<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> And the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are the <S%H4639>work<s%> of Thy <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

"Even they will perish, but Thou dost <S%H6>endure;<s%> And <S%H5975>all<s%> of them will <S%H3605>wear<s%> out like a <S%H1086>garment;<s%> Like <S%H899>clothing<s%> Thou wilt <S%H3830>change<s%> them, and they will be <S%H2498>changed.<s%>
"But Thou art the <S%H1931>same,<s%> And Thy <S%H8141>years<s%> will not <S%H8552>come<s%> to an <S%H8552>end.<s%>
"The <S%H1121>children<s%> of Thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> will <S%H7931>continue,<s%> And their <S%H2233>descendants<s%> will be <S%H3559>established<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> Thee."
